attributes.action: Bring back  option of buying your mobility scheme vehicle at the end of lease
attributes.additional_details: We all would like the government to bring this option back so people if the want to buy the car they can and this would help so many people  knowing this is a option as finding a suitable car after losing there mobility  car after lease will be stressful and many would suffer as a result not haveing this option so please reinstate this option
attributes.background: They took away the option to buy your mobility  vehicle at the end of the lease  away this can be very stressful and disappointing for many people knowing if the wanted to buy the car at end of lease you can't and they would be left with out a car your struggle to find a car suitable for there needs
